page.title: 19TRELLECH FESTIVAL.
page.content: THE FRIENDS OF TRELLECH ASSOC. WAS STARTED IN 1974 BY A MRS.HAILE. THERE ARE 35 MEMBERS ALTOGETHER IN THE SOCIETY. THE FRIENDS OF TRELLECH ASSOCIATION ORGANIZE A FESTIVAL CALLED 'THE FLOWER AND MUSIC FESTIVAL' WHICH IS HELD IN THE LAST WEEK IN JUNE EVERY YEAR. THE CHURCH IS DECORATED WITH FLOWER ARRANGMENTS DISPLAYED BY THE CHURCH LADIES, AND FOR TWO EVENINGS THERE ARE MUSIC RECITALS IN THE CHURCH. ON FRIDAY JUNE 28TH. 1985 THERE WERE FOLK GROUPS WITH GUITARS, AND 80 PEOPLE ATTENDED. ON THE SATURDAY EVENING 175 PEOPLE ATTENDED THE EBBW VALE MALE VOICE CHOIR. AS WELL AS THE FESTIVAL, THE FRIENDS OF TRELLECH HOLD POETRY RECITALS, LISTEN TO HISTORICAL TALKS, AND ARE GENERALLY INTERESTED IN TRELLECH HISTORY.
